name: @twist3dink/design-system
description: Token build pipeline for twist3dink.xyz (Style Dictionary)

scripts.tokens:clean: node -e "import fs from 'node:fs'; import path from 'node:path'; const p=path.resolve('outputs'); fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('Removed', p);"
scripts.tokens:verify: node ./build/lint-tokens.mjs && node ./build/build-tokens.mjs && node -e "import fs from \"node:fs\"; import path from \"node:path\"; const out=path.resolve(\"./outputs\"); const req=[\"tokens.css\",\"tokens.ts\",\"tokens.fingerprint.json\"]; const missing=req.filter(f=>!fs.existsSync(path.join(out,f))); if(missing.length){console.error(\"Missing outputs:\", missing.join(\", \")); process.exit(2);} console.log(\"Outputs present:\", req.join(\", \"));"
